org.ligoj.app.plugin.prov

Class ProvResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ligoj.app.resource.plugin.AbstractServicePlugin
      • org.ligoj.app.resource.plugin.AbstractConfiguredServicePlugin<ProvQuote>
        • org.ligoj.app.plugin.prov.ProvResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<org.ligoj.app.api.FeaturePlugin>, org.ligoj.app.api.ConfigurablePlugin, org.ligoj.app.api.FeaturePlugin, org.ligoj.app.api.ServicePlugin, QuoteRelated<ProvQuote>

    @Service
 @Path(value="/service/prov")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public class ProvResource
extends org.ligoj.app.resource.plugin.AbstractConfiguredServicePlugin<ProvQuote>
implements QuoteRelated<ProvQuote>
    The provisioning service. There is complete quote configuration along the subscription.

      • findLocations

        @GET
 @Path(value="{subscription:\\d+}/location")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public org.ligoj.bootstrap.core.json.TableItem<ProvLocation> findLocations(@PathParam(value="subscription")
                                                                                                                                                                  int subscription,
                                                                                                                                                                  @Context
                                                                                                                                                                  javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo)
        Return the locations available for a subscription.
        Parameters:
        subscription - The subscription identifier, will be used to filter the locations from the associated provider.
        uriInfo - filter data.
        Returns:
        The available locations for the given subscription.

      • findLocation

        public ProvLocation findLocation(int subscription,
                                 java.lang.String name)
        Check and return the expected location within the given subscription. The subscription is used to determinate the related node (provider). Return null when the given name is null or empty. In other cases, the the name must be found.
        Parameters:
        subscription - A visible subscription for the current principal.
        name - The location name. Case is insensitive.
        Returns:
        The visible location for the related subscription or null.

      • getConfiguration

        public QuoteVo getConfiguration(org.ligoj.app.model.Subscription subscription)
        Return the quote configuration from a validated subscription.
        Parameters:
        subscription - A visible subscription for the current principal.
        Returns:
        The configuration with computed data.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

public FloatingCost refreshCost(@PathParam(value="subscription")
                                                                                                                           int subscription)
        Compute the total cost and save it into the related quote. All separated compute and storage costs are also updated.
        Parameters:
        subscription - The subscription to compute
        Returns:

      • findConfigured

        Check the visibility of a configured entity.
        Type Parameters:
        K - The Configurable identifier type.
        T - The Configurable type.
        Parameters:

        name - The requested configured name.
        Returns:
